0: Sadly the pool remains incomplete but will sure be epic
A swimming pool would be nice
The pool still is not open and the Thai restaurant across the street would randomly close
Only very minor downside is the location of the pool which is adjacent to another building aprox
The pool was closed due to a leak of some sort and the spa had not yet opened but the manager was kind enough to give us a walking tour of the area and shared the plans for the space
From what I saw it is bound to be a success the only downside is that the pool spa area is across from the hotel it is a stones throw away however
It was cold in Nairobi and we never got to enjoy the red pool

There were no club lounge amenities to avail of we were told we had to move out of the comfy pool area as it was reserved even though there was only one other person there and worst offence was that it took 2 weeks for the hold of 70USD to be released back into our account after we had checked out and paid the bill

The only reason I did not give five stars is the lack of any green space and the pool is not within the hotel complex and seemed to be a hangout spot for trendy Nairobi hangout and people were smoking hookahs by the pool while I was swimming laps
The pool did not have enough shaded areas and the days were extremely hot but the staff did not help in any way so we could not enjoy the pool at all
1: The rooms are spacious and clean and the pool area is nice
The room are spacious very nice bathroom big bath tub which I liked Great food oh the pool is red something different
The Rouge Deck with it is red tiled swimming pool was a special touch
Very well designed hotel with remarkable pool and good restaurants and bars
The food was good the pool area is great but a short walk from the main building

the pool the other hand is good looking but not in the good position because the sun never gets there and the water is not heated the pool only looks good in photos but actually is not comfortable service is good the location is good and very convenient because its in the center and just beside it its a another restaurant called secret garden nice coffee nice food you can check it out
With Nairobi ’s ever changing weather The gorgeous swimming pool The Rouge deck is perfect for relaxing or just lounging by the pool and enjoying a cocktail from the pool bar
Very nice swimming pool and gym
Very nice heated pool which is fine in the Kenyan winter season
Great facilities from the Red pool to lovely hotel rooms friendly stuff
